body.name: Adesso CyberTrack K1 1080P Full HD Fixed Focus USB Webcam with Adjustable View Angle Built-in Dual Microphones, Privacy Shutter, Audio/Video Mode Privacy ON/Off Switch & Tripod Mount
features: 5 levels of adjustable Field of View - With a press of a Field of View button, users can adjust the field of angle view from 80/90/100/110/120 degrees which enables everyone in the room to be seen in different scenarios.

1080P High Definition - The Cybertrack K1 is a 1080P High Definition webcam with Fixed Focus and High refreshing rate of 30fps can not only give you a smoother video experience, but can also record high-definition video in any lighting condition.

Advance Audio/Video Privacy Toggle Switch - Advance toggle Audio/Video privacy switch for the webcam when not in use, and it is perfect to provide privacy, security and peace of mind to individuals, groups, organizations, companies and governments. The webcam comes with a tripod mount, convenient for you to place the computer camera.

Pan and Tilt feature – 3 Axis Position - Enjoy the freedom of achieving the angle you are looking for by adjusting the range of motion using the pan & tilt 3 axis position making it easier to showcase documents and articles.

2.1 Megapixel CMOS Sensor - This webcam features a true 2.1 Mega-Pixel CMOS image sensor that provides crisp, colorful and clear Full HD quality video and snapshot image at a maximum resolution while using minimal resources.
body.description: Adesso’s CyberTrack K1 is a 1080P Fixed-Focus Full HD Desktop Webcam with 30 frame per second that allows you to record and share colorful vivid Ultra HD quality video with fine detail. This webcam includes a built-in dual microphone that lets your voice be heard loud and clear, whether you are chatting with loved ones or doing business on a video call. Moreover, it also includes a Tripod Mount & Audio/Video Privacy Shutter Switch, with all these great features, you can easily record and transmit your videos to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PLUG AND PLAY WEBCAM
reviews.reviewText: On a Windows 11 PC, I plugged this webcam and it was 100% plug-and-play. I didn’t need to manually install any drivers or configure any settings. I just plugged it in, went to Zoom and it worked great.PROS: - Easily tilts - 1080P resolution - Includes microphone - Mount fits on any monitor - Adesso is a known quality brand - Product listing is spot-on accurate - Easy plug-and-play setup for Windows - Works with Zoom and any other web conference appCONS: - More costly than some lesser known brands and modelsOverall, for web conferencing, this is a suitable device and works well. While the cost is nominally more than some lesser models, if you’re looking for a reliable and easy to use device, it may be worth the extra couple of bucks.
